description: Manage and organize your Twitter bookmarks efficiently through AI assistants. List, search, filter, and label bookmarks to enhance your Twitter experience. Integrate seamlessly with AI tools supporting the Model Context Protocol for streamlined bookmark handling.

tools.name: list_bookmarks
tools.description: List user's Twitter bookmarks with optional filtering and pagination. Supports filtering by read status, media type, author, tags, date ranges, and sorting options.

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results

posted_to.description: Filter tweets posted before this date (ISO 8601 format)

posted_from.description: Filter tweets posted after this date (ISO 8601 format)

bookmarked_to.description: Filter bookmarks added before this date (ISO 8601 format)

bookmarked_from.description: Filter bookmarks added after this date (ISO 8601 format)

tools.name: search_bookmarks
tools.description: Search through a user's Twitter bookmarks using either keyword (text) search or semantic (meaning-based) search. Supports all list_bookmarks filters, full-text search via the q field, and semantic search via the vector_search_term field for natural language or topic-based queries.

q.description: Keyword or text search query for finding bookmarks by exact words or phrases

limit.description: Number of search results to retrieve (1-100)

cursor.description: Pagination cursor for next page of results

posted_to.description: Filter tweets posted before this date (ISO 8601 format)

posted_from.description: Filter tweets posted after this date (ISO 8601 format)

bookmarked_to.description: Filter bookmarks added before this date (ISO 8601 format)

bookmarked_from.description: Filter bookmarks added after this date (ISO 8601 format)

vector_search_term.description: Semantic search query for retrieving bookmarks based on meaning and context, not just keywords. Use for natural language questions or topic-based searches.

tools.name: get_bookmark_count
tools.description: Get the total count of user's bookmarks with optional filtering. Useful for understanding the size of bookmark collections before listing them.

author.description: Count bookmarks from specific author username

posted_to.description: Count tweets posted before this date (ISO 8601 format)

media_type.description: Count only bookmarks of specific media type

posted_from.description: Count tweets posted after this date (ISO 8601 format)

bookmarked_to.description: Count bookmarks added before this date (ISO 8601 format)

bookmarked_from.description: Count bookmarks added after this date (ISO 8601 format)

tools.name: list_labels
tools.description: List all user's labels with their usage counts. Useful for discovering existing labels before adding new ones or to understand the current labeling system.

tools.name: add_labels_to_tweets
tools.description: Add a label to a list of tweets. Can use an existing label by ID or create a new label by name. This is useful for organizing and categorizing tweets after searching or filtering

label_id.description: ID of an existing label (get this from list_labels). Use this if the label already exists.

tweet_ids.description: Array of tweet IDs to add the label to

label_name.description: Name of the label to create and add. Use this if you want to create a new label.
